collectible.title: Master Ball
collectible.subtitle: Normally you'd have to battle him at the Frigate for this...
collectible.text:
When he promised you 'something special' after the game, you didn't exactly expect this.
Either way, it's the best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
collectible.unlock: You'll need to prove you're capable of handling it. Win a game against Colress.
